allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Backup: Original SPB AI Dispatch Assistant before API testing framework

This is the baseline version before implementing:
- Multi-LLM provider support \(OpenAI/Customer API\)
- API comparison testing framework
- Step-by-step test execution logging
- Comparison report generation

Current features:
- SQL Agent for waybill queries
- CSV Agent for vehicle dwell time analysis
- PDF Agent with RAG for document Q&A
- Math Agent for calculations
- Ollama \(gpt-oss\) as LLM provider

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash("C:/Users/user/anaconda3/envs/chatbot_spb/python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.stdout.reconfigure\(encoding=''utf-8'', errors=''replace''\)
sys.path.insert\(0, ''..''\)

from backend.llm_provider import LLMProvider
from calculation_agent import run_calculation_tests

print\(''Running calculation tests with Ollama \(gpt-oss\)...''\)
print\(''This will take several minutes due to local LLM inference.''\)
print\(''=''*60\)

results = run_calculation_tests\(LLMProvider.OLLAMA, ''test_data/sppc_project_portfolio.csv''\)

print\(''\\n'' + ''=''*60\)
print\(''RESULTS SUMMARY''\)
print\(''=''*60\)
for test_name, result in results.items\(\):
    status = ''PASS'' if result.success else ''FAIL''
    print\(f''{test_name}: {status} \({result.total_latency_ms:.0f}ms\)''\)
    if result.final_answer:
        print\(f''  Answer: {str\(result.final_answer\)[:100]}''\)
")
